Control Name: CONTINGENCY PLAN TESTING | ALTERNATE PROCESSING SITE
Control Statement: The organization tests the contingency plan at the alternate processing site: (a)   To familiarize contingency personnel with the facility and available resources; and (b)   To evaluate the capabilities of the alternate processing site to support contingency operations.Supplemental Guidance:  Related control: CP-7.
